gene.function: FUNCTION: Required for protein transport from the endoplasmic reticulum to the Golgi complex.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Endoplasmic reticulum-Golgi intermediate compartment membrane {ECO:0000269|PubMed:17081065}; Lipid-anchor {ECO:0000269|PubMed:17081065}. Melanosome {ECO:0000269|PubMed:17081065}. Endoplasmic reticulum membrane {ECO:0000305}; Lipid-anchor {ECO:0000305}. Golgi apparatus membrane {ECO:0000305}; Lipid-anchor {ECO:0000305}. Note=Identified by mass spectrometry in melanosome fractions from stage I to stage IV.
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: endoplasmic reticulum to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport [GO:0006888]
